name: Atomic Vantage X 75 C Ski
description: The Atomic Vantage X 75 C Ski is designed for skiers who want a versatile and high-performing ski. Featuring a lightweight and durable construction, this ski provides excellent stability and control on various snow conditions. The Vantage X 75 C comes with a Titanium Backbone 2.0 for improved edge grip and stability, as well as a Carbon Tank Mesh for added durability. Its versatile shape allows for both on-piste and off-piste skiing, making it a great choice for skiers who want to explore different terrains. Perfect for intermediate to advanced skiers, this ski offers a balance of performance and comfort.

name: Rossignol Experience 88 Ti Ski
description: The Rossignol Experience 88 Ti Ski is a high-performance ski designed for advanced skiers looking for a versatile and powerful ski for all-mountain adventures. It features a Hybrid Core with a blend of wood and carbon for a light yet strong construction. The ski includes a titanal reinforcement layer that enhances edge grip and stability on hard-packed snow and icy conditions. With an 88mm waist width, the Experience 88 Ti offers a great balance of stability and agility, making it suitable for both groomed runs and off-piste exploration. Ideal for skiers who want a reliable and high-performing ski for various conditions.
